Title: White Deer Plain
Writer: Zhongshi Chen (novel), Wei Lu (screenplay), Jie Shen
Actors: Fengyi Zhang, Yuqi Zhang, Gang Wu, Yihong Duan
Plot: In the White Deer Village in Shaanxi Province the two most important families - Bai and Lu - and their sons have always lived together in peace. But the turmoil leads to a fierce struggle for land ownership.
